name: Cell Operator
description:
Cell Operator is an arcade game where you try to survive endless waves of enemies.

Avoid them at all cost.

Collect upgrades.

And survive.

Controls ActionKeyboardControllerMoveW,A,S,DJoystick Left
AimMouseJoystick RightShoot (Hold)Left clickRight TriggerGrenadeGLeft Button
BlastRight ClickRight ButtonPauseEscapeMenu Button Upgrades Speed   You move faster Shield

 

You have an extra life Fire rate You shoot faster Blast You can activate a blast to wipe your enemies
Grenade Drop a grenade to make your enemies explode
